page.title: 16A PUPIL'S SCHOOL DAY
page.content: I wake up in the morning at 6.30am and I get dressed and have my breakfast ready for the{school bus}to pick me up at 8.10am.I get to school at 8.40 and the bell goes at 8.45am.We then have the register and have{assembly}at 9.00am.After that we can buy crisps and sweets from the school tuck shop. We usually have{Maths}up until play- time which is at 10.30am.I drink my milk then which costs 5p a day.After play we do{English}work and dinner is at 12.00 until 1.00.I bring sandwiches to school for my lunch as the school doesn't provide lunches any more.As it is a Tuesday, we have{Games}in the afternoon and I play football and the girls play netball.We finish school at 3.05p.m. and we all say a{prayer}and I stay for practice which is football that is until 4.00p.m. when I have a lift home.
